bibl.title: P. Artemid.: The Map.
Images and Texts on the "Artemidorus Papyrus". Working Papers on P. Artemid. (St. John's College Oxford, 2008)
bibl.author: TALBERT, Richard

bibl.note: P. Artemid. (= M.-P.3 168.02; LDAB 7132). "I share the editors' view that the map is genuinely ancient rather than a 19th or 20th century forgery." - Dimensions and penwork. - Symbols. - Linework. - Orientation and scale. - Purpose and scope. - Conclusion.
TALBERT Richard, P. Artemid.: The Map.

Kai BRODERSEN and Ja≈õ ELSNER (Edd.), Images and Texts on the "Artemidorus Papyrus". Working Papers on P. Artemid. (St. John's College Oxford, 2008) = Historia. Einzelschriften. 214 (Stuttgart, 2009) pp. 57-64.
